main_definition: Attempts or makes an effort to do something.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To attempt to accomplish a task or goal.
meanings_and_examples.example: She tries every day to learn a new language.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Seeks to achieve success by taking action.
meanings_and_examples.example: He tries to get into the best college in his state.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Attempts or endeavors with effort or energy.
meanings_and_examples.example: The athlete tried his hardest during the race.
